data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Armavir, Armenia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Armavir, Armenia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 3,552 believers in the state of Armavir the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Armavir, Armenia.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Armavir, Armenia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Armavir, Armenia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Armavir, Armenia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Armavir, Armenia, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Armavir, Armenia that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
